dialogStrings: {Tifa}'s House

{Tifa}
“My room?”

{Cloud}
“It was my first time there.”

{Tifa}
“Was it?”

{Cloud}
“I only used to look up
at it from outside.”
“Hey, look!”

{Tifa}
“Now that you mention it…I don't recall
you ever being in my room…”

“{Tifa} always used
to have her own group.”

{Tifa}
“…That's right.”
“I thought they were all…stupid.”

{Tifa}
“What!?”

“You were all childish, laughing at
every little stupid thing.”

{Tifa}
“But we were children then.”

“…I know.
I was the stupid one.”

“I really wanted to play with everyone,
but you never let me in the group.”

“Then later…I started
thinking I was different…”{PAUSE}“That I was different from
those immature kids.”
“That then…maybe…”

“Just maybe,
they would invite me in.”

“I thought that might happen,
so I hung around…”

“I was so prejudiced.
…And weak.”

“That night I asked {Tifa} to come
out to the well…”{PAUSE}“I thought to myself {Tifa} would
never come…that she hated me.”

{Tifa}
“…It was so sudden.
I was a bit…surprised.”

{Tifa}
“But…”

{Tifa}
“It's true we weren't THAT close, but…”

{Tifa}
“After you left town,
I really thought about you a lot.”

{Tifa}
“I used to wonder
how {Cloud} was doing.”{PAUSE}“I wondered if you were
able to get into SOLDIER?”

“I started reading the newspapers, thinking
I might see an article about you.”

“Thanks, {Tifa}.”{PAUSE}“Tell him what you told me, later.
He'll probably be so happy.”

{Tifa}
“OK!”

{Tifa}
“Huh?”

{Tifa}
“What happened on this day?
Was it a special day?”
“This was the day…”
“{Tifa}'s mother…”

{Tifa}
“The day Mom died…”
